# ic-theme



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                        | Type                                                    | Default   |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | The theme colour. Can be a hex value e.g. "#ff0000", RGB e.g. "rgb(255, 0, 0)", or RGBA e.g. "rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)". | ``#${string}` \| `rgb(${string})` \| `rgba(${string})`` | `null`    |
| `theme`  | `theme`   | The theme mode. Can be "dark", "light", or "system". "system" will use the device or browser settings.             | `"dark" \| "light" \| "system"`                         | `"light"` |


----------------------------------------------
